name: Red Raider 2
description:
A patrol ship searches for a possible dangerous vessel, they find what they are looking for. Will you be able to fight off the attacker and escape?

A small little retro game I made using java, where you fight off an attacking ship that progressively gets stronger as you go. Any feedback about the game would be very helpful.                                                                                                     

You will need to download a JRE to be able to run the .jar. You can trying lowering the sleep time in settings or the settings.txt if you are experiencing performance issues, note that this may increase CPU usage.
